name: Power Out
description: This goes beyond bad luck. Something—or someone—has knocked out some of our electrical substations. The engineer I sent out to fix it hasn't returned, so I need all available Raiders to look into it. That includes you.
objectives: Find the Electrical Substation south of the Spaceport, next to the Checkpoint
Find any sign of the missing engineer
Carry the fuse/battery back to the Electrical Substation
Enable the power switch on the Fuse Box
